// single RTU packet example (including even parity bits in MSBs)
wait 100 ms

// Target address
101
// "[Hello World"
15b 48 65 6c 6C 6F 120 157 6f 72 6c 164
// " 0123456789"
120 30 131 132 33 134 35 36 137 138 39
// " ABCDEF"
120 41 42 143 44 145 146
// " abcdef]"
120 161 162 63 164 65 66 15D
// CRC-16
191 10d

rand 300 500 ms

101
15b 41 161 42 162 143 63 44 164 145 65 146 66
120 39 138 137 36 35 134 33 132 131 30 15d
95 123

rand 350 450 ms

101
15b 48 65 6c 6C 6F 120 157 6f 72 6c 164
120 30 131 132 33 134 35 36 137 138 39
120 41 42 143 44 145 146
120 161 162 63 164 65 66 15D
191 10d

rand 3000 5000 ms

102
15b 41 161 42 162 143 63 44 164 145 65 146 66
120 39 138 137 36 35 134 33 132 131 30 15d
19e 63
